advantages.title: What advantages will I have as a freelancer?
advantages.firstadvantagedescription: The Paraguay tax system only taxes income earned within the national territory. Therefore, if you are a digital nomad and all your income comes from outside Paraguay, you will be totally exempt from paying taxes on it. The payment of dividends from a foreign company would also be completely tax-free, making it ideal to combine your residence with an offshore company or LLC to get rid of 100% of taxes.
advantages.secondadvantagetitle: Visit the country at least once every 3 years
advantages.secondadvantagedescription: Paraguay does not require you to spend half a year in the country to pay taxes, unlike the vast majority of countries. Therefore, according to the country's current regulations, you must visit the country at least once every 3 years to demonstrate that you actually reside there. Similarly, there is no way to verify that stay, so there are people who spend longer periods without entering Paraguay.
advantages.thirdadvantagedescription: Paraguay is a country where infrastructure is still largely underdeveloped and in need of improvement. Therefore, it becomes a good option for investment, thanks to low taxes and government assistance to encourage foreign investment in the country in any of its forms.
advantages.fourthadvantagedescription: As of today, permanent residency in Paraguay has no expiration date, so you will not have to worry about renewing it.
advantages.fifthadvantagedescription: Another advantage of Paraguay is that once you obtain your residency, you can access the same rights as any citizen except for participation in politics. You can start businesses, get a driver's license, invest, and even buy properties if your goal is to live or even enter the real estate business.

requirements.title: What requirements must I meet?
requirements.firstrequiredescription: A current copy of the original issued by the corresponding civil registry is sufficient.
requirements.secondrequiretitle: Good conduct or criminal record letter
requirements.secondrequiredescription: This document is only necessary for people over 14 years old and must not be more than 2.5 months old.
requirements.thirdrequiredescription: If you are married or divorced, you must present the respective certificate to prove your marital status.
requirements.thirdrequireddescription2: Depending on your country of origin, these documents must either be apostilled with the Hague Apostille, as is the case in Spain; or in certain cases, they must be legalized by the corresponding Paraguayan consulate in your country of origin or current residence.
requirements.fourthrequiretitle: A local currency account with a deposit of 34,331,150 guaraníes (approx. €4,600) to demonstrate economic solvency.
requirements.fourthrequiredescription: This money will remain blocked until obtaining the residency card and the ID card. Once these documents are obtained, the deposit can also be withdrawn.
requirements.fourthrequiredescription2:
If you are married, only one account is required for the couple and/or the family with minor children.
If you have a university-level professional degree, you can use it as collateral to demonstrate economic solvency and thus avoid having to make the deposit mentioned above.
If you are a pensioner, the notification of the pension also serves as collateral for economic solvency and the deposit will not be necessary.
requirements.fifthrequiredescription: This document is obtained directly in Paraguay during your visit to apply for residency.
requirements.sixthrequiredescription: You must present notification of your pension, a document indicating the amount you currently receive, issued by the competent entity, pension fund, etc., in order to prove economic solvency.
